name: Milk Swim
description:
"expectation"

In Milk Swim Haruhiko has failed his exams and will repeat the grade, but does not dare to tell his parents. As a thick fog covers the city, he knows there are only three days left before his parents will find out.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2005-01-24. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The engine was created by Jet. Music was composed by mikey. Estimated completion time is 40 minutes.

Milk Swim is game Nr. 5 of the Original 22.
